この繚乱の高揚を\r\n: This extravagant exhilaration like a cluster of fireworks
太陽は知らない 月には届かない\r\n: The sun doesn't know it, the moon can't reach it
ざわめく人ごみのまとわりつく温度\r\n: The clinging warmth of the bustling crowd
遠雷に似た合図が響く\r\n: A signal resembling distant thunder resounds
逸る想いと呼び合うように\r\n: As if feelings of excitement call out to us
感じさせてよ もっと 愛を\r\n: Make me feel love that grows
暗闇に咲く葛藤と見つめ合っていたい\r\n: I want to lock eyes with conflict that blooms in the darkness
沈黙を破って降りそそぐたび\r\n: Everytime the charcoal rains down incessantly in silence
心 儚さに揺れて\r\n: My heart is shaken bu ephemerality
鬱陶しいくらいの熱量に\r\n: In the extreme heat of the moment
あぁ もう少し浮かされていたいな\r\n: Ah, I want to be carried away by it for a little longer
息を呑んで そらさないで\r\n: Hold your breath, and don't look away
忘れたくない繚乱の高揚を\r\n: I don't want to forget this extravagant exhilaration
